name: winter beanie
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
winter beanie crochet pattern pdf – customizable solid beanie with ribbed design – any size based on measurements

stay cozy and stylish this winter with this crochet pattern pdf for a beautifully textured solid beanie with ribs! perfect for beginners and experienced crocheters alike, this pattern is fully customizable to fit any size—from babies to adults—using simple measurements.

✨ what’s included:
step-by-step instructions with clear details for creating the beanie. (us terms)
tips for customizing the fit based on head measurements.
guidance on yarn types and hook sizes for the best results.

 skill level:
beginner – a basic understanding of crochet techniques (like single crochet, half double crochet, and sl st) is helpful.

 custom sizing:
no need to guess! this pattern is designed to fit perfectly based on your measurements, ensuring a snug and comfortable beanie for every head size.

❤️ why you’ll love this pattern:
timeless ribbed texture adds a modern and minimalist touch.
works up quickly—perfect for gifting or adding to your market inventory.
suitable for various yarn weights, making it versatile and budget-friendly.

 note:
